name: Reliable Data Entry
description:
Reliable Data Entry Inc. (RDE) is an industry leader for providing comprehensive project solutions for all your data entry needs. We are a privately owned and operated Canadian company founded in 1985 by CEO, Donna Pinheiro. Specializing in data entry processing since the company's inception, RDE has built a solid reputation by offering timely and flexible project management solutions in a professional and friendly manner.
Our high standards of service as demonstrated through our accuracy guarantee, experience and expertise gives our company a competitive edge over all other data entry service bureaus. RDE realizes the importance of ingenuity and innovation. We strive to provide the most current technological support and customized programming in order to create a streamlined flow of information and communication between our project specialists and our clients. By outsourcing your data entry needs to RDE we will alleviate additional stresses, time and costs that would accompany these projects if they were tasked internally. Now your personnel is free to concentrate their efforts and resources on your company's main business requirements leaving the data entry to us, the experts. Our mission at RDE is to establish long-standing relationships by providing exceptional quality and exceptional service to all of our clients.
READ MORE...
